results.description: Australia international Sam Kerr, widely regarded as one of the best strikers in the world, signs for Women's Super League leaders Chelsea.

results.title: Sam Kerr: Australia international joins WSL leaders Chelsea

results.description: Captain Harry Kane remains England's first-choice striker, but what do the stats tell us about who Southgate should be selecting to lead the line?
results.shortTitle: Can Abraham push Kane for England spot?
results.title: Tammy Abraham: Is Harry Kane's England place under threat from Chelsea striker?

results.description: Za a bai wa kocin Arsenal Unai Emery dama a wasanni shida masu zuwa da kungiyar za ta yi domin tabbatar da cewa zai iya ci gaba da jagorantar kungiyar.
results.title: Man U na shirin sayo Zaha, Man City za ta kashe makudan kudi

results.description: Chelsea record a sixth consecutive Premier League win for the first time since their most recent title-winning season in 2017.
results.title: Chelsea 2-0 Crystal Palace: Frank Lampard's side record sixth straight win

thumbnail.altText: Christian Pulisic celebrates scoring Chelsea's second goal

results.description: Crystal Palace manager Roy Hodgson says he is "proud" of his side's performance despite 2-0 defeat to Chelsea.
results.title: Roy Hodgson 'proud' of Crystal Palace's performance after Chelsea loss

results.description: Head coach Frank Lampard says Chelsea "deserved" the 2-0 win against Crystal Palace after picking it up in the second half.
results.title: Chelsea 2-0 Crystal Palace: Frank Lampard says Chelsea 'deserved' win after a strong second half

results.description: Wannan shi ne wasa na shida da Chelsea ta ci a jere, abin da ya ba ta damar darewa mataki na biyu a teburi da maki 26 cikin wasa 12.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea ta zama ta biyu a teburin Premier
results.title: Premier League: Chelsea ta zama ta biyu a teburi

results.description: Chelsea boss Frank Lampard says he fears failing to follow pre-match rituals such as walking the dog at a certain time can have a negative impact on the team's results.
results.title: Frank Lampard: Chelsea boss says his superstitions impact on results

thumbnail.altText: Frank Lampard smiling at Chelsea training

results.description: Frank Lampard is named Premier League manager of the month after guiding Chelsea to three straight victories in October.
results.shortTitle: Lampard wins manager of the month award
results.title: Frank Lampard: Chelsea boss named Premier League manager of the month for October

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

results.description: Frank Lampard says Chelsea were "sloppy" but he loved the spirit they showed in their comeback from 4-1 down to draw 4-4 against Ajax in the Champions League.
results.title: Frank Lampard loved spirit in Chelsea comeback against Ajax

results.description: Chelsea come back from 4-1 down to draw a Champions League thriller against an Ajax side who have two men sent off.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea fight back to draw thriller
results.title: Chelsea 4-4 Ajax: Champions League thriller ends in stunning draw

results.description: Eight goals, two red cards, two penalties, two own goals, another VAR intervention and a point each - the Champions League delivers again.
results.shortTitle: 'I don't think I've seen a game like it'
results.title: Chelsea 4-4 Ajax: Frank Lampard says Champions League game 'right up there'

results.description: Chelsea midfielder Mason Mount limps off in his side's 4-4 Champions League draw with Ajax and could miss two England games.
results.shortTitle: Chelsea's Mount a doubt for England
results.title: Mason Mount: Chelsea midfielder is injured against Ajax and could miss England games

results.description: Chelsea might be one of the most successful teams of the Premier League era, but has Frank Lampard restarted their heartbeat?
results.title: Frank Lampard: Has Chelsea boss restored 'soul' of club?

results.description: Chelsea and Ajax draw a classic Champions League game, while Liverpool beat Genk 2-1 to move closer to qualification.

results.title: Chelsea v Ajax & Liverpool v Genk in Champions League

results.description: BBC football analyst Pat Nevin looks at the impressive start to the season made by Chelsea's Mason Mount, and his big similarities to another Premier League midfielder.
results.shortTitle: Which Premier League legend is Mount turning into?
results.title: Pat Nevin analysis: How Chelsea midfielder Mason Mount is making a big Premier League impression

results.description: Chelsea manager Frank Lampard warns that the current use of VAR could be "dangerous" for the Premier League.
results.title: Frank Lampard: Chelsea manager claims 'we're in really dangerous place' with VAR

results.description: Chelsea manager Frank Lampard is "surprised" with the VAR decision to award Watford a penalty against his side, following the Blues' 2-1 win at Watford.
results.shortTitle: We're in a difficult place with VAR - Lampard
